results.title: Swoon
results.brief_description: Tom Kalin’s first feature is a stylish and challenging interpretation of the 1924 kidnapping and murder of a young boy by Chicago’s famous lovers Nathan Leopold and Richard Loeb. Although based on court transcripts and archival research, the fractured narrative and experimental format are utilized to question the mythology of the ‘pathological’ homosexual and to reorder history as it was reported.
results.description: Tom Kalin’s first feature is a stylish and challenging interpretation of the 1924 kidnapping and murder of a young boy by Chicago’s famous lovers Nathan Leopold and Richard Loeb. Although based on court transcripts and archival research, the fractured narrative and experimental format are utilized to question the mythology of the ‘pathological’ homosexual and to reorder history as it was reported.

Although based on court transcripts and archival research, the fractured narrative and experimental format are utilized to question the mythology of the ‘pathological’ homosexual and to reorder history as it was reported.

results.title: Switch on Bigga
results.creator_credit: Film Australia, Electricity Commission of New South Wales (N.S.W.), Stanley Hawes, Lee Robinson and Australia. Dept. of the Interior. Film Division
results.brief_description: A unique look at the coming of electric power to a small rural district in NSW and the benefits derived from electricity by the farmer and his family. Includes a country style grand switching on ceremony.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Film Australia, Electricity Commission of New South Wales (N.S.W.), Stanley Hawes, Lee Robinson and Australia. Dept. of the Interior. Film Division

results.title: The Girl I love: music video for the band Positronic
results.creator_credit: Advanced Diploma of Multimedia (ADoM), Swinburne University of Technology (formerly Electronic Design and Interactive Media (EDIM) and Stephen Clarke
results.brief_description: This animated music video was created in 3D studio Max for student’s band - Positronic. Although it was the first time that he had used this software, he makes the most of simple scenes, metaphorical imagery and 3D ariel effects to effectively communicate the song’s message - A small town girl leaves her home to find fame and fortune in the big city, leaving beind her boyfriend who must come to terms with her departure.
results.title_for_label: The Girl I love: music video for the band Positronic
results.creator_credit_for_label: Advanced Diploma of Multimedia (ADoM), Swinburne University of Technology (formerly Electronic Design and Interactive Media (EDIM) and Stephen Clarke

Although it was the first time that he had used this software, he makes the most of simple scenes, metaphorical imagery and 3D ariel effects to effectively communicate the song’s message - A small town girl leaves her home to find fame and fortune in the big city, leaving beind her boyfriend who must come to terms with her departure.
